descricao: What if baby Kal-El's rocket landed, not in Kansas, but in the Soviet Union? That is the premise of this Elseworld's tale from DC Comics.
principaisAtores: Jason Isaacs, Amy Acker, Diedrich Bader, Vanessa Marshall

descricao: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
principaisAtores: Steve Carell, Catherine Keener, Paul Rudd, Romany Malco

descricao: A divorced lawyer falls for a charismatic cardiologist. But when their difference in size leads to family friction, is she ready to listen to her heart?
principaisAtores: Juliana Paes, Leandro Hassum, Marcelo Laham, Luana Martau
produtora: Buena Vista International, Coração da Selva, Downtown Filmes

titulo: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
descricao: The Joker is back with a vengeance, and Gotham's newest Dark Knight needs answers as he stands alone to face Gotham's most infamous Clown Prince of Crime.
principaisAtores: Will Friedle, Kevin Conroy, Mark Hamill, Angie Harmon

descricao: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
principaisAtores: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine

descricao: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
principaisAtores: Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz, Jeffrey Wright, Colin Farrell
produtora: Warner Bros., DC Entertainment, 6th & Idaho Productions

descricao: There's a mystery afoot in Gotham City, and Batman must go toe-to-toe with a mysterious vigilante, who goes by the name of Red Hood. Subsequently, old wounds reopen and old, once buried memories come into the light.
principaisAtores: Bruce Greenwood, Jensen Ackles, John DiMaggio, Neil Patrick Harris

descricao: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
principaisAtores: Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
produtora: Warner Bros., Legendary Entertainment, DC Entertainment
